page.title: 08Newquay's Fishing Craft
page.content:
There are three types of fishing vessel operating from Newquay harbour: boats used for inshore fishing;near and middle water craft;distant trawlers.
The inshore boats are designed as drifters or seine netters. They are normally around 20 to 30 feet long and 8 to 12 feet wide. All are equipped with radios,some with echo-sounders.
Near and middle craft are mainly netting and long lining boats,but can be adapted to other types of fishing, e.g.,wreck or shark fishing.They are 50 feet in length and up to 20 feet wide.
Distant water trawlers are 200 feet in length and cruise for three weeks at a time,netting and long lining.
